column2: an A.M. Eatery////Food saved the day though. Or the pancakes. My husband got the trio with pineapple upside down
column4: and the special of the day which was chocolate chip with butterscotch. He really liked them. He got a side of bacon which was nice and crisp. I got the breakfast pot pie which was average. I really liked the hashbrowns but the gravy and puff pastry was salty and didn't really have great flavoring besides salt. Hard to distinct the flavors of gravy. Not my favorite:
